Module org.nasdanika.common
Package org.nasdanika.common

Interface Composeable<T>

Type Parameters:
T -
All Known Subinterfaces:
AccessController, Context, Converter, DiagramGenerator, MutableContext, NopEndpointProcessorFactory<P,H>, ProcessorFactory<P,H,E>, ProgressMonitor, ResourceLocator
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractEObjectFactory, BasicDiagnostic, ContextAdapter, Converter, DefaultConverter, DiagramGeneratorImpl, DrawioEObjectFactory, EModelElementAnnotationResourceLocator, EObjectContext, FilterDiagramGenerator, FilterProgressMonitor, LocaleLanguageResourceLocator, LogProgressMonitor, NopEndpointReflectiveProcessorFactory, NullProgressMonitor, PrintStreamProgressMonitor, ProgressEntry, ProgressRecorder, PropertySourceEObjectFactory, ReflectiveConverter, ReflectiveProcessorFactory, ResourceSetPropertySourceEObjectFactory, RussianResourceLocator, SimpleMutableContext, SimpleMutableResourceLocator, UI
public interface Composeable<T>
Something that can be composed to create an aggregate. E.g. AccessControllers can be composed with AND operation, Contexts can be composed by chaining.
Author:
Pavel

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    T
    compose(T other)
    Returns a composition of this instance and the other with this instance being the first if the order of composition is important.
    static <T> T
    composer(T a, T b)
     

  • Method Details

    • composer

      static <T> T composer(T a, T b)
      Type Parameters:
      T - Instances of T shall implement Composeable.
      Returns:
      Composing operator which can be use in reducing streams of Composeables to a single composeable.
